Share your website account cookies to your friends without login with password.
无须分享你的账号密码，与朋友一起共享账号登录态，而避免相互踢下线。建议同一IP下使用，避免封号。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
页面登录态共享可以用于例如爱奇艺、优酷等视频网站账号共享，或新东方学习账号、Udacity等账号共享。 
【注意】 
1. 请 只分享给值得信任的朋友 ，因为该分享操作等于他能在你登录有效期内操作你的账号，属于 高危操作； 
2. 切勿分享 支付宝等 敏感账号信息，以防信息泄露； 
3. 可以的话尽量在同一IP下分享账号，以免被查水表。 

若你想踢掉所有分享人的登录态，请手动退出已登录的账号，并重新登录。

问题反馈可以留言到我邮箱：admin@scottleung.com

Session Share can be used for video website account sharing, such as IQY, Youku, or New Oriental Learning Account, Udacity and other account sharing.
[notice]
1. Please only share it with trustworthy friends, because the sharing operation is equal to that he can operate your account within the validity period of your login, which is a high-risk operation.
2. Don't share sensitive account information such as Alipay to prevent information leakage.
3. If possible, try to share accounts under the same IP so as not to be detected by the system.

If you want to kick out the login status of all the shareholders, please manually exit the logged-in account and re-login.

Feedback can be left to my email: admin@scottleung.com
